attributes.action: This petition is to open the churches at least in the coming weeks
attributes.additional_details: The churches should open because catholic’s like myself are finding it hard to cope without eucharist or church. It would be a great relief to go to churches and pray silently. This can help people to find peace in this distressing times of sorrow and we can help to improve this situation by praying to our God.
attributes.background: I want the government to open the churches. In the coming weeks, to start of without mass is alright
